name: Dashworks
headline: Your team's intelligent start page.
description: Dashworks is where work begins. Where all your documents, messages, tickets, and other knowledge scattered across your company's apps and people come together seamlessly. And where you and your team can get on the same page, and get things done.

# AI that answers all your team’s questions
Stop searching through endless tools and answering internal FAQs. Get instant answers with AI that searches all your company knowledge at once.
[Get a Demo![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a393984b_dashworks-icon.svg)](http://www.dashworks.ai/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/66922c468a3a4cc00a1f869e_homepage.jpg)

## Your AI assistant for workplace questions
Say goodbye to information silos. Dashworks connects all your apps and provides a unified search experience, offering real-time answers to your team’s most pressing questions.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6619482190021783d686e040_Frame%201991423593%20copy.webp)
Unify all your apps and knowledge bases
Connect all your apps, websites, and docs.
[Explore integrations](http://www.dashworks.ai/</integrations>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/661940bdbf678de085cb818f_Frame%201991423593.webp)
Get up-to-date answers with citations
Dashworks uses real-time search to ensure you always get the latest information from your apps.
[Learn more](http://www.dashworks.ai/</features>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/668f2cad5d8ebdfb01121c02_Group%201991423092.png)
Create and customize AI assistants
Create one or many bots for your use case, from new hire onboarding to product questions.
[Explore Bots](http://www.dashworks.ai/</bots>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/661948b28ebcafedc663614c_Frame%201991423593.webp)
Automatically answer Slack questions
Use Dashworks right in Slack or make it your team’s browser homepage.
[Explore Slackbot](http://www.dashworks.ai/</slack>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6619489f7e3b404916d179f4_Frame%201991423593.webp)
Enterprise-grade security from ground up
SOC-2 Type 2, GDPR, and HIPAA Type 2 compliant. Industry-leading AI that does not require data indexing.
[Explore security](http://www.dashworks.ai/</security>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/668f2980f4beafa35bb995c9_llm%20choice.png)
Future proof your AI strategy
Securely access AI models like GPT-4o, Claude, Gemini Pro, and Llama 3 in one place.
[Learn more](http://www.dashworks.ai/</features>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/661948668ebcafedc66311e3_Frame%201991423593.webp)
Get setup within minutes
Deliver immediate search capabilities to your team with just a few clicks, without lengthy indexing.
[Get started](http://www.dashworks.ai/<https:/web.dashworks.ai/signup>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/66678eef359c67a3fc645180_12%20plan.webp)
Flexible and transparent pricing
Simple pricing that adapts to your team's needs, no matter your size.
[See pricing](http://www.dashworks.ai/</pricing>)
THE OLD WAY
## Legacy enterprise search duplicates your entire data
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939872_pricing-cross.svg)
Up to **1 hour delay in syncs** lead to out-of-date answers
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939872_pricing-cross.svg)
Requires **days to setup** to wait for initial sync to complete
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939872_pricing-cross.svg)
Catastrophic **risk of security breach** from duplicating data
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939872_pricing-cross.svg)
Up to **1 hour delay in permission updates (ACL)** risk unintended leaks


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/671d2e703791608e19d642b2_Old_Way_Oct_26th.png)
[Learn more](http://www.dashworks.ai/<https:/www.dashworks.ai/blog/legacy-enterprise-search-systems-are-a-ticking-time-bomb>)
THE NEW WAY
## Agentic enterprise search finds the latest data live
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939837_check-icon-light.svg)
**0 second delay** from live search ensures up-to-date answers
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939837_check-icon-light.svg)
**Instant setup in minutes** due to no sync required
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939837_check-icon-light.svg)
Support for **zero-data retention** for maximum security
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939837_check-icon-light.svg)
**Instant permission updates** ensure ACLs are respected at all times


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/671d76ab1d2c2b429092f217_live-search.png)
[Learn more](http://www.dashworks.ai/<https:/www.dashworks.ai/blog/privacy-first-enterprise-search-why-dash-ai-ditched-indexing>)
## One AI assistant,customizable for every team’s needs
Dashworks bridges information gaps across your teams and provides quick and accurate answers to questions about your product, processes, policies, projects, people, and more.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a393984e_customer-success.svg)Support](http://www.dashworks.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939829_sales-icon.svg)Sales](http://www.dashworks.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939827_engineering-icon.svg)Engineering](http://www.dashworks.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a393982a_marketing-icon.svg)Product](http://www.dashworks.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
## Reduce response times, increase satisfaction
Enable fast and accurate responses to customers by empowering support reps with quick access to information buried in historical tickets, support docs, and product wikis.
[Explore Customer Support](http://www.dashworks.ai/<https:/www.dashworks.ai/solutions/customer-success>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/66c75213ed5f21b4964a38f7_cs-2.png)
[Explore All Features](http://www.dashworks.ai/<#>)
## Close deals faster with instant answers
Enable your sales team to confidently self-serve answers to customer questions, reducing response times and shortening sales cycles.
[Explore Sales](http://www.dashworks.ai/<https:/www.dashworks.ai/solutions/sales>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/66ce0cd5285f8965a057fd55_sales-1.png)
[Explore All Features](http://www.dashworks.ai/<#>)
## Unblock engineers, unlock velocity
Get instant help with resolving on-call issues, fixing bugs, and finding answers to technical questions by enabling engineers to search across their codebase, docs, issues, and Slack threads, all in one place.
[Explore Engineering](http://www.dashworks.ai/<https:/www.dashworks.ai/solutions/engineering>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/66c74f62aa01725a1a215180_engineering-3.png)
[Explore All Features](http://www.dashworks.ai/<#>)
## Faster product insights,less team FAQs
Dashworks unifies your product data across tools to create a unified knowledge base. Ask product questions in natural language and get precise answers instantly.
[Explore Product Management](http://www.dashworks.ai/</solutions/product-management>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/66c754a5f8a8d655a12de76d_product-1.png)
[Explore All Features](http://www.dashworks.ai/<#>)

### Dashworks: Your Team's Intelligent Start Page

**Founding Story**  
Dashworks was founded in 2019 and emerged from Y Combinator's W20 batch. Based in the bustling heart of San Francisco, the company has a small but proficient team of 9 individuals dedicated to transforming how teams access information.

**Mission**  
The mission of Dashworks is clear: to serve as the intelligent start page for your team. Essentially, it's the place where all scattered documents, messages, and knowledge tools converge so that everyone can be on the same page and, importantly, get things done efficiently.

**What Does Dashworks Do?**  
Dashworks allows teams to harness the power of AI for seamless workplace communication and knowledge management. Through a single search interface, it enables users to pull up vital information and answers, cutting down on time spent sifting through different applications. It’s like having a personal assistant but on a grand scale.

1. **Unified Search**: The platform connects all your apps, consolidating knowledge bases to answer questions in real-time. No more toggling between a dozen tabs; everything is at your fingertips.
  
2. **Customization**: Users can create and customize AI assistants tailored to specific tasks, whether it's onboarding new hires or answering product-related questions.
  
3. **Integrations**: Dashworks offers robust integration capabilities to work within your existing tools, such as Slack, thereby feeding into existing workflows without disruption.
   
4. **Security**: With enterprise-grade security (SOC-2 Type 2, GDPR, and HIPAA compliance), Dashworks ensures that your data stays safe while avoiding redundancy and security risks typically associated with traditional enterprise search solutions.

**Client Testimonials**  
Dashworks has received glowing endorsements from its users. Thomas Mancuso, Director of Product Partnerships, noted an improvement in onboarding times and overall responsiveness of sales and support teams. Similarly, users highlighted the tool's accuracy and capability to surface information, significantly reducing the effort spent on repetitive inquiries.

**The Competitive Edge**  
Compared to traditional enterprise search systems, which often require extensive setup and delay in data syncs, Dashworks thrives with its immediate search capabilities and ease of onboarding. This agility makes it an attractive choice for companies looking to streamline processes without the typical hurdles.

**Join the Movement**  
With a growing client base that includes both hypergrowth startups and Fortune 500 companies, Dashworks is shaping up to be a significant player in the SaaS market. If you're looking to eliminate information silos and enhance team productivity, checking out Dashworks could be the right move.

**Discover More**  
To explore Dashworks further, visit their website at [Dashworks.ai](http://www.dashworks.ai) and see firsthand how it can revolutionize your team's workflow. Ready to transform how your team accesses knowledge? Get a demo today!
